headline: S&P 500 & Nasdaq Notch New All-Time Closing Highs
summary: Markets lost a bit of steam mid-session this Monday, but a late surge into the close brought the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq indexes to new record closing highs.

headline: How To Earn $500 A Month From Merck Stock Ahead Of Q2 Earnings
summary: Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) will release earnings results for the second quarter before the opening bell on Tuesday, July 29. Analysts expect the health care company to report quarterly earnings at $2.03 per share, down from $2.28 per share in the year-ago period. Merck projects to report quarterly revenue at $15.87 billion, compared to $16.11 billion a year earlier, according to data from Benzinga Pro. headline: Blockbuster Drugs on Patent Cliffs Research Report 2025 | 2030 Patent Cliff to Be Largest Since 2010, Hitting Blockbusters Like Keytruda, Eliquis, and Darzalex
summary: Upcoming 2025-2030 patent cliff threatens revenue for major pharma companies as Merck, BMS, and J&J top drugs lose exclusivity. Strategies like M&A, R&D investment, and life cycle management could help sustain growth.
